Message.Msg: The rich aren't dumb enough to average down. Averaging down is a technique for the poor.

Message.Title: MONDAY'S HIGH WILL BE
Message.Msg: $652 after that GOOG will be down $15 on the day or more. A huge bull trap has been set for Monday's trade.

While one should surely focus on the bottom line misses, I believe that the top line provided by Google is one of a kind in the market. The Company is an incredible growth story as it reported an increase in revenues by 45% YoY.

Topic.Title: ANALYST Predicts Decline To $ 685!!!! SEE REPORT
ALERT: GOOG HAS POSSIBLY HIT BOTTOM

Message.Msg: Very ACCURATE technical - Thanks Please inform me on CTXS & WYNN & OCLR as i think they bottomed on Thursday and watch for CRM earnings tuesday I day-trade Options & actually bought the $635 GOOG calls on Friday morning at $3.90 I sold WAY too quickly Went up to nearly $13 !! Then i saw lots of volume come on on the $650 Puts - people got in at .50-.60 cents Then GOOG dropped to $646 before 4PM !! Those puts ran up to about $4 !! FRIDAY is great for Options day-trades you play them ? PCLN also hit $611 twice on Friday before big bounce back UP !! Wendy
